sqlMap.select: select DEPARTMENT_NO as departmentNo, DEPARTMENT_NAME as departmentName from comm_departments order by department_no asc
sqlMap.update: update comm_departments set department_name = #departmentName# where department_no = #departmentNo#
sqlMap.select: select DEPARTMENT_NO as departmentNo, DEPARTMENT_NAME as departmentName from comm_departments where department_no = #value#
